SEARCH
Package cz.itnetwork.controller

Class PersonController

java.lang.Object
cz.itnetwork.controller.PersonController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class PersonController extends Object
Controller for managing persons. Provides REST API endpoints for operations related to persons.

Provides the following services:

  • Adding a new person
  • Retrieving a list of all persons
  • Deleting a person by ID
  • Retrieving a person by ID
  • Updating a person by ID
  • Retrieving invoices associated with a person (buyer or seller)
  • Retrieving statistics about persons
Since:
2024

  • Method Details

    • addPerson

      @PostMapping("/persons") public PersonDTO addPerson(@RequestBody PersonDTO personDTO)
      Adds a new person.

      Creates a new person based on the provided data. The input data should be in JSON format corresponding to PersonDTO.

      Parameters:
      personDTO - object containing the details of the person to be added
      Returns:
      the added person as PersonDTO

    • getPersons

      @GetMapping("/persons") public List<PersonDTO> getPersons()
      Retrieves a list of all persons.

      Returns a list of all persons in the system, represented as a list of PersonDTO objects.

      Returns:
      a list of all persons as Listinvalid input: '<'PersonDTO>

    • deletePerson

      @DeleteMapping("/persons/{personId}") public void deletePerson(@PathVariable Long personId)
      Deletes a person by ID.

      Deletes the person with the specified ID. If the person with this ID does not exist, no action is taken.

      Parameters:
      personId - ID of the person to be deleted

    • getPerson

      @GetMapping("/persons/{personId}") public PersonDTO getPerson(@PathVariable Long personId)
      Retrieves a person by ID.

      Returns detailed information about the person with the specified ID. If the person with this ID does not exist, an appropriate error response is returned.

      Parameters:
      personId - ID of the person to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the person as PersonDTO

    • updatePerson

      @PutMapping("/persons/{personId}") public PersonDTO updatePerson(@PathVariable Long personId, @RequestBody PersonDTO personDTO)
      Updates a person by ID.

      Updates the existing person with the specified ID based on the new data provided in PersonDTO. If the person with this ID does not exist, an appropriate error response is returned.

      Parameters:
      personId - ID of the person to be updated
      personDTO - object containing the updated details of the person
      Returns:
      the updated person as PersonDTO

    • getInvoiceBuyer

      @GetMapping("/identification/{identificationNumber}/purchases") public List<InvoiceDTO> getInvoiceBuyer(@PathVariable String identificationNumber)
      Retrieves invoices associated with a person as a buyer based on their identification number.

      Returns a list of invoices where the person is listed as the buyer. The invoices are represented as a list of InvoiceDTO objects.

      Parameters:
      identificationNumber - identification number of the person
      Returns:
      a list of invoices as Listinvalid input: '<'InvoiceDTO>

    • getInvoiceSeller

      @GetMapping("/identification/{identificationNumber}/sales") public List<InvoiceDTO> getInvoiceSeller(@PathVariable String identificationNumber)
      Retrieves invoices associated with a person as a seller based on their identification number.

      Returns a list of invoices where the person is listed as the seller. The invoices are represented as a list of InvoiceDTO objects.

      Parameters:
      identificationNumber - identification number of the person
      Returns:
      a list of invoices as Listinvalid input: '<'InvoiceDTO>

    • getPersonStatistics

      @GetMapping("/persons/statistics") public List<PersonStatisticDTO> getPersonStatistics()
      Retrieves statistics about persons.

      Returns statistical data about persons, such as totals or other metrics, represented as a list of PersonStatisticDTO objects.

      Returns:
      a list of person statistics as Listinvalid input: '<'PersonStatisticDTO>
